short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save any email from Gmail or Outlook to instantly share, collaborate, and analyze your favorite emails.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save, share, and analyze any email from Gmail or Outlook with the Spotmar plugin for Chrome.

To collect an email, simply view it in your browser and click on the button in your inbox to send it instantly to a dedicated collection in your Spotmar account.

Spotmar is the world's largest library of marketing emails, where you can browse for inspiration and create collections filled with your favorite email designs and concepts. Sign up for your free account at: spotmar.com

Why marketers love Spotmar:

- Explore fresh email ideas with easy to use filters for industry and email type.
- Follow brands and competitors, with weekly insights into their email habits.
- Effortlessly collect, analyze, and collaborate on emails from anywhere in a central location.
- Easily import and save your favorite emails

No more labels, tags, or folders of examples you never look at.  Spotmar is a must-have free tool for every email marketer.

A great alternative to Really Good Emails extension that is 100% free for personal use with no suprising limits.
